short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Its going to smash emojis in anyone's fb live to create more engagement and to be the biggest fan of someone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Biggestfan Pro helps you to automate blasting emojis on someone's FB live to create more engagement. You can get noticed by your dream client and be their biggest fan when you are watching their live. A simple interaction on their content could change the entire dynamics of your business.
